name: Bibimbap
description: Bibimbap simply translates to mixed rice with meat and assorted vegetables.
ingredients: raw beef,raw egg,several vegetables,soy sauce,sesame oil,brown sugar,minced garlic

name: Focaccia
description: Italian Bread. It’s perfectly soft and fluffy and satisfyingly chewy. It’s sprinkled with lots of fresh rosemary and crunchy flaky sea salt, and drizzled with extra olive oil just before serving, which soaks perfectly into all of those little classic holes that you have poked in the bread.

name: Gimbap
description: Gimbap is a seaweed rice roll made of gim (a sheet of dried seaweed) and bap (rice).
ingredients: seaweed paper,cooked rice,beef steak,carrot,yellow pickled radish,spinach,egg,garlic,sugar,kosher salt,sesame oil

name: Gnocchi
description: They are small pieces of dough, usually round or oblong in shape that are boiled in water or broth and then tossed with different sauces.

name: Kimchi
description: Kimchi, a staple of Korean households for generations, has gained superstar status in the kitchen, and it’s easy to see why. With a complex flavor and a variety of uses, kimchi's appeal is broad and deep. Made from vegetables, garlic, ginger, and fish sauce, it hits a range of flavors—sweet, sour, and spicy—and works as a condiment, an ingredient, a dip, and a side dish all on its own.
ingredients: Chinese cabbage,water,natural rock salt,cooking salt,rice flour,Korean chili flakes,Korean fish sauce,ginger

name: Pizza Margherita
description: Pizza margherita, as the Italians call it, is a simple pizza hailing from Naples.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Directly translated from Korean, samgyeop-sal, means three layer flesh, referring to striations of lean meat and fat in the pork belly that appear as three layers when cut.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Cylindrical, chewy white rice cake noodles called tteok are stir fried in a delicious spicy gochujang based sauce
ingredients: rice cake,dried anchovies,dried kelp,hot pepper paste,sugar,onion,egg,fish cake
